weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. You need an umbrella when I come down. What am I?
I am big and yellow and hot. I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I can be grey when it will rain.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧣 You need to wear a scarf when I fall.

weather.question: I blow hard and make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: Sometimes after it rains, you can see me in the sky. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 People say there is gold at my end.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a strong rotating storm.

weather.question: I am small balls of ice that fall from the sky. Ouch!

hints.text: 🤕 I can hurt if I hit you!

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?
I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me during a storm.
🌩️ I follow a flash of light.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💦 I like to play in water
🍞 People throw bread to me in the park

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones
🎾 I love to play with balls
🏡 I am a man's best friend

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I never forget. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big and grey
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia

animal.question: I jump really high. I live in Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I have a pouch to carry my baby

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I am a very big cat

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. What am I?
I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I peel my food before I eat it
🌴 I use my long arms to move around

animal.question: I hiss and slither. I have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be many different colors
🌿 I can be found in jungles and deserts
👅 I flick my tongue to smell
